meta.name: description
meta.content: New Millennium Academy Charter School is located in Brooklyn Center, MN.

img.h1: New Millennium Academy Charter School Home

p.a: Enroll Now to New Millennium Academy

figcaption.p: All scholars eat for free here at NMA.
Read, learn, and grow in your education!

div.div: RHINOS : Respect, Help, Inspire, Never Give Up, Overcome

"New Millennium Academy (NMA) provides a safe and healthy work and learning environment for 1) all staff when in the facility and during meal and/or item distribution and 2) children attending NMA’s childcare program. Following the Minnesota Department of Health (MDH) recommendations, this guidance includes information on staff training to prevent transmission of the coronavirus (COVID-19). "
To our NMA Families, here is a resource for if you and your family need food assistance during this uncertain and difficult time. Please do not hesitate if you have questions or concerns.

h3.a: NO COST CHILD CARE - For Families of Tier 1&2 Critical Workers

div.div:
NMA will provide a no-cost childcare to NMA's scholars (KG - 12 years old) whose parents are emergency workers.
If you are an emergency worker and are interested in enrolling your child into our child care program, email Sweet.vang@nmaedu.org for more information.
